dream-big.heading: Dream <1>big.</1> No boundary.
dream-big.paragraph: If you’re desperately seeking for someone who can bring out the best in your business. Look no further, you have found the right man.

get-started.content: Checkout my awesome resume and start to connect with me!

facts.1: 25 years old happy guy living in Tokyo, Japan.
facts.2: Speaks English, Japanese, Chinese and some bits of Korean.
facts.3: Code in Swift and JavaScript. JAMStack are his favorite.
facts.4: Working toward the goal to become an entrepreneur and get ready to change the world.

introduce.heading: Say hello to Oscar !
introduce.profileDescription: Oscar likes to spend many of his time on creative activities - like coding and styling website. He is passionate about learning. He is very proud of his work.

my-strength.heading: One world, one <1>mind</1>.
my-strength.paragraph: Internationalization is hard. But if there is anything so called language barrier, now you’ve got the power to break it.

2.description: Spoken by 1.3 billion across the world.
2.name: Chinese

teaching.description: Regardless of what I do, I always find ways to improve. That is why I chose teaching as my second passion. What I teach, are not limited to my occupation, but also include the language I speak, the books I read, tutorials I watch; all sort of materials I came across.
teaching.heading: The best <1>form</1> of learning.

1.heading: Kinchan has so much fun!
1.quote: (Translated from Japanese) Kinchan is so good at teaching! He really knows a lot and that offers so much fun to just listen to his stories. I leaned a lot from him. Thank you so much!

2.heading: He helped me a lot!
2.quote: (Translated from Japanese) Kinchan is really good at teaching. I leaned from him about CSS and JavaScript. He offered detailed explanations and it was very easy to understand. It was a tremendous help for me.

books.2: The Seven Habits of Highly Effective People

what-I-study.description: Talent is helpful. But knowledge is far more superior. Through self-education, books provide us the key to explore the world yet discovered. The world full of potential.
what-I-study.heading: Leaning into the unknown

what-i-do.description: Relentless, what it takes to become exceptional. With a great appetite to take in new skills, It will not be your typical developer who’s on the project.
what-i-do.heading: Strive to <1>become</1> outstanding.

1.description: From Mobile to Desktop, the possibilities are endless. Need some new feature?
1.title: iOS / Web Dev

2.description: Great product comes with a greater user experience. Crappy UI? Not on my watch.
2.title: UI / UX Design
